pageContext.claim: “We renewed NASA. It was a field of weeds. A field of weeds. President Obama closed it down.”
pageContext.analysis: This is false. In reality, President Obama set in motion the process that led to the successful SpaceX launch with astronauts. He decided to send crews via commercial spacecraft in 2011, an initiative that encountered fierce opposition from Congress, which at first did not provide as much money as NASA sought.
